questiontext.text:
A research on the time that youngsters spend on social media (measured in minutes per day) is carried out using a random sample (N=300). In this sample, the mean equals 192 minutes per day and the standard deviation 30 minutes per day.

The variable of interest follows a normal distribution. According to the Empirical Rule, we can say that approximatelyâ€¦

answer.text: 95% of the observations are between 170 and 214.
95% of the observations are between 182 and 200.
68% of the observations are between 188 and 196.
68% of the observations are between 162 and 222.
